long_description: enabling us to continually provide our customers with both optimal and cost effective billing services. our staff is well equipped and readily available to provide you with high end medical billing services and financial growth. we provide a wide range of professional services to meet your needs. we offer full cycle billing to maintain higher percentages of clean claims. in doing so, we're able to bring in higher revenue to your company. in doing so, we're able to optimize company revenue by exchanging financial losses for profit gains. we offer a wide range of services to meet every type of need.
generated_description: optimal healthcare billing solutions, legally known as the american health information management association, is a company based in fresno, california. the company specializes in providing outsourced billing services to physicians in the valley. their team of credentialed coders and health information management technicians, certified through the american health information management association (ahima), ensures efficient and professional billing processes. optimal healthcare billing solutions offers full cycle billing to maintain high claim submission rates and physician education to keep up with changes in coding regulations and insurance policies. the company aims to deliver optimal and cost-effective billing services, contributing to financial growth for their clients.
